title: summoner spells for Shaco's clone
body:
i just had a idea that i thought was cool which was that you could use your summoner spell with shacos clone. meaning your smite or ignite could be used away from the real shaco. this would make dar and baron stills alot more fun imo. 
of course this wouldnt work well with spells like heal and flash but i think it would be a great idea with the ignite in getting kills. 
your ideas?

replies.body:
"this would make dar and baron stills alot more fun imo."

And by fun you mean risk free, right?

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=zlBk4w9W,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-11T07:14:02.416+0000)
> "this would make dar and baron stills alot more fun imo."
> 
> And by fun you mean risk free, right?

You have a point, a risk free baron/dragon steal would never be tolerated by Riot. 

Allowing Heal or Exhaust might work though.
